#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è

Grabber
CTO (Backend/data pipelines traction)

We are a data analytics company that specializes in Business Intelligence (BI) and profiling.
And we are looking for ambitious, motivated and focused CTO (Backend/data pipelines traction) to help us build the next generation of our platforms.

Skills:

- Good knowledge of modern technologies and approaches, and agility in their use.
- Ability to work with data pipelines
- Advanced level of backend (most preferable Node.js, Python, SQL, go, kotlin, rust)
- Skills in working with relational and non-relational data and their processing
- Skills in working with high-loads/multithreaded systems
- Setting up monitoring/testing systems

Desirable:

- A deep understanding of blockchain (not cryptocurrencies) architecture is desirable
- Basic devops experience (Docker preferable)
- Knowledge of Express.js, Next.js or other js frameworks
- Options after successful completion of the trial period

Remote work.
With potential for full-time and relocation (if desired).
After completing the first level, it is assumed that you will be included in an option program or receive a share in the company.

–æ—Ç 6 000 –¥–æ 9 000 USD 

Contact and info: @alexandra_polyakova27

#–í–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è

Traffic Manager for the first CeDeFi Platform (remote)

Work format: remote
Full-time
Salary range: $2 000 - $2 500 net, but we can discuss your salary expectations.
Employment: contract
Company name: Midas.Investments

Midas.Investments is a custodial ‚ÄúCeDeFi‚Äù investment platform offering market-leading yields on an array of cryptocurrencies, including BTC, ETH, and USDC.

By combining the simplicity of CeFi with the transparency of DeFi strategies, and fueled by an algorithmic infrastructure and 24/7 portfolio monitoring, we have built an ecosystem of intuitive tools that allows any investor to generate sustainable passive income in the crypto economy.

Now we are looking for a Traffic Manager.

Responsibilities
 - Build and manage advertising with CPA networks, Google Ads and Facebook (involving agencies). Control of campaigns during all the stages, 
 - Collaborate internally to integrate our brand narrative, product positioning, and messaging in all aspects of paid advertising, 
 - Own our Affiliate Program which already attracted to the platform more than $60 000 000 in deposits,
 - Monitor performance metrics and revenue targets across all affiliate channels to guide and manage priorities,
 - Run affiliate nurture campaigns to drive higher engagement for existing products and support new product launches, 
 - Stay current with trends in affiliate marketing and identify new opportunities both within the cryptocurrency industry.

Key Requirements
 - 3+ years of working in marketing for crypto, fintech, and blockchain startups,
 - Knowledge of the rules of moderation in Google Ads and Facebook for crypto projects, 
 - Knowledge of analytical tools: Google Analytics, Redash, Amplitude,
 - Understanding of marketing funnels and experience in its building, 
 - Network with crypto advertising agencies and webmasters will be an advantage. 

Compensation
Competitive remuneration package based on your experience.

Please text me in telegram, I will be happy to answer your questions and tell you more about the vacancy: @kalinina888 (Tatiana).

#–í–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è

General Alpha Research Analyst

XQUI (Exquisite) is a community-based Private Investment NFT DAO. We are a community of crypto investors, project founders, researchers, DeFi and NFT analysts, crypto traders, gem hunters, degens and more. Our mission is to unite crypto to move towards the real Web3 vision. Ultimately, we are building a friendly ecosystem of crypto experts in an eco-friendly manner ‚Äî we plan to share knowledge and experience while entering the new stages of the crypto market. Our community of any NFT holders have exclusive access to:
- Gain private club access. XQUI community is a private club: access is only granted to NFT holders. Membership in the XQUI community, with a strong network of founders and investors in DeFi, NFT and web3.
- A professional team of experts. All XQUI holders maintain exclusive access to crypto research, conducted by XQUI's best analysts. Members, in this way, receive leading industry analysis and insight through masterclasses, bespoke research papers, AMAs and NFT whitelist and private investment opportunities
- Exclusive content. AMA sessions with crypto-known experts in their fields, covering areas such as Crypto, Blockchains, NFTs and DeFi
Community events. Informative XQUI Web3 conference/workshops, insightful mastermind sessions, exciting poker games, as well as calming yoga and meditation events
- Access to the XQUI DAO. All holders can get access to private investments through XQUI DAO NFT (XQUI Private, XQUI DeFi, XQUI Metaverse), where the fund will be distributed by DAO voting. 
We are looking for a great Alpha researcher to join our team on a permanent basis to provide comprehensive research to the XQUI community

Core Responsibilities:
- Searching for any new crypto market opportunities and conducting possibilities of earning on the crypto market:
   - Undervalued tokens/projects
   - Testnets
   - P2E/M2E projects
   - Ambassador programs  
   - Nodes
   - Parachain Auctions
   - Whitelists
   - Airdrops
   - ICO/IDO/IFO/IEO
   - and more
- Conduct comprehensive research of any opportunity found to gain profit in order to invest in
- Collect and provide detailed and insightful reports summarizing the research and reports findings like - https://www.getrevue.co/profile/defiprime?via=twitter-card&client=DesktopWeb&element=publication-card
- Participate in AMA about market opportunities and take part in team meetings

Skills Requirements:
- Strong attraction to self-development in the crypto, finding new solutions to earn
- Analytical and research skills with exceptional attention to detail
- The ability to research and analyze the latest trends in the crypto market
- A minimum of 6 months of experience in doing a comprehensive research 
- Excellent writing, editing, critical thinking, and communication skills

XQUI Offer:
- A unique opportunity to join one of the strongest and most successful NFT, Trading, and DeFi teams globally, and get the level of responsibility and ownership that would be unlikely at any other firms
- Great company culture: non-hierarchical, ambitious, informal, highly professional and collaborative

Tips for a successful application:
- Only apply to us if you are genuinely interested or curious about this role; this is not for someone who is just looking for ‚Äúa job‚Äù
- Fill out the form describing your experience and the results obtained in finding alpha in more detail if you‚Äôd like to apply. Tell us about why you are interested in alpha in general and in XQUI in particular

Fill out the form at the link - https://forms.gle/xFn2LF28NuSgC4Sv5 

Social media:
Website - https://xqui.io 
Twitter - https://twitter.com/xquieth 
Discord - https://discord.gg/xqui

#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #–æ—Ñ–∏—Å #–ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞ 

PR Manager / 3-6 years experience

COVESTING is incorporated in Europe, while its infrastructure will include an authorised digital asset exchange, copy-trading platform and fiat/crypto gateway fully compliant with strict requirements of European regulators. 

Our products and services are attractive to both neophyte investors and professional traders. They cover a wide range of cryptocurrency trading aspects, from education, market analysis, and trading ideas to liquidity aggregation, copy-trading and algorithmic order execution.

ESSENTIAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Develop and execute PR plan of the company
- Research and propose new PR, brand building and promotions concepts
- Content plan creation and execution
- Write and edit a variety of materials, including website content; press releases; video news release shot sheets;
- Update and maintain media profiles and contact information
- Contact media outlets to arrange interviews, appearances, and other media exposure
- Post press releases and media information to the web site as appropriate
- Respond to, or direct, media inquiries as appropriate, in a timely fashion
- Manage additional media or public relations functions as requested
- Proactively pursue media mentions worldwide
- Assist Covesting team members and employees as needed
- Travel to PR events as assigned (not more than 2 per year)

KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS, & ABILITIES:
- Exceptional communication skills (written, verbal and presentation) are required
- Existing tech/trading/finance/blockchain background is essential
- Existing contacts with media resources preferred
- Creativity, time and project management skills
- Ability to work under deadline pressure and manage change
- Proficient in English, able to write articles without proofreading.
- Candidate should be extremely proactive and work independently.

Position Title: Customer Support Representative ‚Äì ICO Support
 
About CashBet:
CashBet is the world‚Äôs ONLY complete, crypto-ready iGaming platform.  Founded by industry veterans, we are based in Oakland, California, USA and Sofia, Bulgaria.  Our licensable technology provides an edge for mobile operators.  Our business has been operational for 5 years.  
 
CashBet is issuing the CashBet Coin (CBC) token to solve the major problems in iGaming and crypto casino operations today: speed, trust, cost, access, and content.  The presale will be from January 24 ‚Äì February 20, 2018.  The public sale will commence March 20, 2018 and last until April 27, 2018 or until the hard cap is reached.
 
Position Overview:
We are looking for professional, temporary contractors to join our ICO support team from January 24, 2017 ‚Äì May 30, 2018.  Team members will be paid a prorated amount of $2,500 USD monthly for 40 hours of work per week.  A bonus of 5,000 CBC tokens will be paid for those persons who can work greater than 90 days.  
 
Information about the CashBet ICO may be found at coin.cashbet.com.  This is an individual contributor role with expectations of high productivity.  The ICO Customer Service Representative (ICO CSR) will act as the first line of contact between CashBet and token purchasers.  The CSR must act professionally during all interactions with our, sometimes rude and demanding, customers.  You will be responsible for monitoring and responding to requests on our Telegram, Facebook, Twitter, and other social media points of contact.
 
The successful candidate will have excellent communication skills in English and preferably other language(s).  He or she will be expected to come up to speed quickly on the CashBet ICO.  The ability to work independently and be self-motivated are must-haves.
 
The Customer Support Representative is expected to:
‚Ä¢ Respond to customers in a warm, polite, and timely manner, no matter how rude they are
‚Ä¢ Ascertain problems or reason for contacting customer service
‚Ä¢ Resolve questions and complaints via email, Telegram, social media and forums in a timely manner, consistent with defined SLAs
‚Ä¢ Thoroughly document ALL interactions with players
‚Ä¢ Assist with the improvement of customer service materials such as FAQs and email templates
‚Ä¢ Escalate issues that cannot be individually resolved to the Support Manager
‚Ä¢ Be extremely organized and fully briefed within their realm of responsibility
‚Ä¢ Attend all mandatory training sessions and become knowledgeable of the CashBet ICO
‚Ä¢ Work independently or as part of a team when necessary, but always productively
 
Required experience and knowledge
‚Ä¢ Employees should not have a problem with gambling or gambling businesses.  
‚Ä¢ ALL employees must be 18 years or older
‚Ä¢ Because of the nature of the business, prior criminal convictions will disqualify you from employment.
‚Ä¢ No specific prior experience is required
‚Ä¢ MUST HAVE Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
‚Ä¢ MUST HAVE Excellent typing skills
‚Ä¢ MUST HAVE Social Media, primarily Telegram, Twitter, and Facebook experience; Forum experience a plus
‚Ä¢ MUST be able to RTFM.
‚Ä¢ Written communication skills in a second language are a plus
‚Ä¢ Prior experience in customer service is a plus
‚Ä¢ Excellent teamwork skills and great attitude
‚Ä¢ Prior ICO support experience is a plus
 
Please respond with an indication of interest and curriculum vitae to jobs@cashbet.com. CashBet is an equal opportunity employer.

- Decentralized nodes discovery 
- Private blockchain technology 
- Encrypted databases in a hostile environment 
- Data replication and consensus protocols 
- Nodes incentivization and service level agreements enforcement

- We are using Scala and/or Go, so it would be great if you have an experience in either. Interest in functional programming languages is appreciated. 
- Experience with large scale databases / distributed systems design like Cassandra, Kafka, Spark or Druid. 
- Solid understanding of algorithms and data structures ‚Äì it actually will be used! 
- Interest in decentralized applications and blockchain technology. 
- An ability to work in a decentralized team, take responsibilities and be a self-starter.
